casebody.data:
John P. GREINER, Petitioner,
v.
MACOMB COUNTY, MICHIGAN, et al. No. 19-8006. Supreme Court of the United States. May 26, 2020.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until June 16, 2020, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a).
